The 
Billings Food Bank gathers food and other essentials to meet the needs of the 
under privileged in our community. The food bank accepts
donations
of food all year around and each and every donation is 
greatly appreciated.  The Billings Food Bank is always looking for
volunteers 
to help with processing and distribution of the
